lines.speaker: march
lines.text: Huh, you made this conversation? I guess it's not a bad job

lines.speaker: olric
lines.text: I think it's great. In fact, you could even say it rocks.

lines.speaker: march
lines.text: Don't you have something better to do than this, like farming?

choices.text: All my farmings done for the day
I'm just taking a short break

lines.speaker: march
lines.text: I guess I can't argue with that.

lines.speaker: march
lines.text: Somehow I knew you were slacking off while making mods.

lines.speaker: olric
lines.text: I'm just excited to see what you make next!
